name: Spatium Navis
description:
This is a game made for the Wowie Game Jam 4.0. 

How the game works is that you (the player) can move, but cant shoot. Your AI teammate on the other hand, can't move but can shoot. You have to move your team mate around and lure enemy to him. Once the enemy is in range, your team mate will spin around and shoot. You have to lure the enemy into the bullets.

-HOW TO PLAY-

-The player will move toward your mouse if you press mouse 1 or press w

-You can push your teammate around

-DONT LET THE BAD GUYS TOUCH YOU
